I think David Staff's idea with an integrations server is probably the
best way to go.

Other than that, I don't see the problem. Why not just run JUnit as a
console application / Ant Build or alike?
If you want, you can wrap it in a batch-file or something to make it
even easier to start.

Why is this situation not to your satisfaction?

Greetings,
   Malte
